duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute sourcing and procurement operations for the company, working with multiple locations and several different divisions.
Utilize analytical skills to gather and analyze data related to procurement processes.
Apply knowledge of the food industry to enhance sourcing and procurement strategies.
Demonstrate coachability and a willingness to learn new procurement techniques and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Supply Chain, Food Science or a related field (Master's preferred)
